channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cookie Notification Plugin for WordPress – WP Cookie User Info
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cookie Notification Plugin for WordPress – WP Cookie User Info

item.title: CVE-2021-24858|2024-08-03T19:42:17.244Z -- unknown -- cookie%20notification%20plugin%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20cookie%20user%20info
item.description: The Cookie Notification Plugin for WordPress plugin before 1.0.9 does not sanitise or escape the id GET parameter before using it in a SQL statement, when retrieving the setting to edit in the admin dashboard, leading to an authenticated SQL Injection
